amendatorysection.catchline: Right-of-way; obstruction in watercourses; condemnation; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: The board of supervisors, in behalf of such district, shall have the right to acquire, and if need be, condemn in the same manner as is provided in section 31-321, any natural or artificial obstruction in any existing watercourse, and remove the same therefrom for the benefit of the district.

annotation.para: Act, as amended 1909, is constitutional, though it omits provisions for recovery of damages. Nemaha Valley Drainage Dist. No. 2 v. Marconnit, 90 Neb. 514, 134 N.W. 177 (1912).
